item.title: 美国农民的下一个热门商品是用于生物燃料的油菜籽
item.description:
在健康烹饪中越来越为人们所熟知的种子油有可能在低排放燃料市场上发挥更大的作用。11月的选举带来了一些风险。【原文：

The seed’s oil, more familiar in healthy cooking, has the potential to play a bigger role in low-emitting fuel markets. November’s election poses some risks.

】

item.description:

。【原文：

Big Tech reports offer a potential catalyst for equity gains

】

item.title: 迪拜国际航空公司称波音飞机延误阻碍其扩张计划
item.description: 迪拜国际航空公司（FlyDubai）表示，该公司今年将不会接收任何波音公司的新飞机，交付时间表的修订使这家迪拜低成本航空公司的扩张计划陷入混乱。【原文：FlyDubai said it won’t receive any new Boeing Co. aircraft this year, in a revision of the delivery schedule that throws the Dubai low-cost specialist’s expansion plans into turmoil.】

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯下令禁止以中国为中心的在线赌场
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr）周一表示，菲律宾将禁止面向海外赌客的在线赌场，关闭该行业的呼声日益高涨。【原文：The Philippines will ban online casinos catering to gamblers overseas, President Ferdinand Marcos Jr said Monday, amid mounting calls to shut the industry.】

item.title: 黑暗舰队阴谋暴露拥挤的马六甲海峡日益增长的风险
item.description: 随着黑暗船队的扩大，以及中国需求的低迷导致数十艘油轮闲置，新加坡附近海域发生的一起导致两艘船只起火的碰撞事故凸显了拥挤的马六甲海峡日益增长的风险。【原文：A collision that set two vessels ablaze off Singapore has underlined the growing risks in the crowded Straits of Malacca, as the dark fleet expands and lackluster Chinese demand leaves dozens of the tankers idling.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行减息押注并非完全错误，但并非基准线
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，市场对欧洲央行今年再降息两次的押注并非 "完全错误"，但不应被视为 "既定或基准情景"。【原文：Market bets on two more European Central Bank interest-rate reductions this year aren’t “entirely misplaced,” but shouldn’t be taken as “a given or a baseline scenario,” according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 亿万富翁亚历克斯-格尔科（Alex Gerko）输掉了与量化交易员报酬有关的税务之争
item.description: 英国最大的纳税人之一、亿万富翁量化交易员亚历克斯-格科（Alex Gerko）在与英国当局关于延期付款计划税务处理的法律纠纷中败诉。【原文：One of the UK’s largest taxpayers, billionaire quant trader Alex Gerko lost a legal dispute with British authorities over the tax treatment of a deferred payment plan.】

item.title: 丹格特与尼日利亚的对峙加剧，投资面临风险
item.description: 非洲首富阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）说，他的大型炼油厂生产的柴油是尼日利亚销售的最好的柴油，尽管立法者正在考虑对该国的燃油质量进行调查。【原文：Aliko Dangote, Africa’s richest man, says that diesel produced by his massive refinery is the best that’s sold in Nigeria, even as lawmakers consider a probe into the quality of fuel in the country.】

item.title: 安联集团认为德国葡萄园将蒙受数千万美元的损失
item.description: 在许多葡萄园因严重霜冻损失了全部收成后，安联 SE 保险公司预计今年将向德国酿酒商支付数千万欧元的保险索赔。【原文：Insurer Allianz SE expects to pay German winemakers tens of millions of euros in insurance claims this year after many vineyards lost their entire harvest to heavy frosts.】

item.title: 本地基金在预算案公布前减持印度股票
item.description: 在周二的联邦预算案公布前，国内机构投资者转为谨慎，上周从本地股票中净撤资 5 亿美元。【原文：Domestic institutional investors turned cautious ahead of Tuesday’s federal budget, pulling a net $500 million from local shares last week.】

item.title: 金融稳定委员会警告：全球遏制银行外金融风险的努力正失去动力
item.description: 金融稳定委员会（Financial Stability Board）周一表示，全球为控制银行系统外不断膨胀的风险所做的努力正在失去动力，该委员会的一位高级官员警告说，要全面了解对冲基金、私人信贷公司和其他投资者的脆弱性，所需的时间比预期的要长。【原文：Global efforts to tame ballooning risks outside the banking system are losing steam, the Financial Stability Board said on Monday, with a top official warning it will take longer than expected to get a full picture of vulnerabilities at hedge funds, private credit firms and other investors.】

item.title: CSOP 将在香港推出亚洲首只反向比特币 ETF
item.description: 尽管比特币因美国总统乔-拜登决定放弃竞选连任而反弹，但香港将成为新型比特币交易所交易基金的所在地，允许投资者对原始加密货币下注。【原文：Hong Kong will play host to a new type of Bitcoin exchange-traded fund allowing investors to bet against the original cryptocurrency even as it rallies on US President Joe Biden’s decision to abandon his reelection bid.】

item.title: 沃达丰出售 13 亿欧元 Vantage Towers 股份偿还债务
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）又出售了价值 13 亿欧元（14 亿美元）的 Vantage Towers 公司 10%的股份，这家英国电信公司正努力减少债务。【原文：Vodafone Group Plc sold another 10% stake worth €1.3 billion ($1.4 billion) in Vantage Towers, as the UK-based telecommunications firm seeks to reduce its debt.】

item.title: 欧洲股市收跌，财报和拜登新闻成为焦点
item.description: 欧洲股市上涨，结束了一周来的跌势，原因是投资者评估了财报结果以及乔-拜登退出美国总统竞选的决定。【原文：European stocks gained, snapping a week of losses, as investors assessed earnings results and Joe Biden’s decision to step down from the US presidential race.】

item.title: 印度风险加剧，经济增长预测低迷
item.description: 印度政府担心全球风险日益加剧，因此对本财年的经济增长做出了相当保守的预测。【原文：India’s government set a fairly conservative economic growth forecast for the current fiscal year, concerned about mounting global risks.】

item.title: 维旺迪为 Canal+ 股票选择伦敦证券交易所，为 Havas 分拆选择阿姆斯特丹证券交易所
item.description: 随着法国亿万富翁文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）推进其庞大的媒体和娱乐帝国的分拆计划，维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）表示，其 Canal+ 广播业务应在伦敦证券交易所上市，哈瓦斯（Havas）广告公司可能在阿姆斯特丹交易。【原文：Vivendi SE said that its Canal+ broadcasting business should be listed on the London Stock Exchange and that the Havas advertising agency is likely to trade in Amsterdam as French billionaire Vincent Bolloré moves ahead with plans to break up his sprawling media and entertainment empire.】

item.title: 自由港液化天然气重启，欧洲天然气跌至一周来最低点
item.description: 随着得克萨斯州自由港液化天然气工厂部分重启，供应风险减弱，欧洲天然气价格跌至一周以来的最低水平。【原文：European natural gas prices declined to the lowest level in a week as supply risks abated with the partial restart of the Freeport LNG plant in Texas.】

item.title: 乌克兰与债券持有人委员会达成债务重组协议
item.description: 乌克兰与一些私人债权人原则上达成了一项协议，重组 200 多亿美元的国际债务，此举可使这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家避免违约，并节省资金来资助与俄罗斯的战争。【原文：Ukraine reached an agreement in principle with some of its private creditors to restructure more than $20 billion of international debt, in a move that could allow the war-torn country to avoid default and save money to finance its fighting against Russia.】

item.title: Amplats 称约 2800 名员工因重组离职
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的铂金业务完成了对南非业务的重组，迄今已有约 2800 名工人离职。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s platinum business completed a restructuring at its South African operations that’s so far resulted in the departure of about 2,800 workers.】

item.title: 中国购买石油为亚洲现货市场带来些许缓解
item.description: 中国炼油商在中东地区购买石油有助于支撑亚洲原油现货市场，尽管人们对中国的需求轨迹仍存在根深蒂固的担忧。【原文：Oil-buying by Chinese refiners in the Middle East is helping to support the Asian physical crude market, even as deep-seated concerns remain about the trajectory of the nation’s demand.】

item.title: 中国黄金进口因价格高企而减少近三分之二
item.description: 中国上个月的黄金进口量大幅下降，这表明在经济不景气的情况下，贵金属价格上涨令中国买家望而却步。【原文：China’s gold imports plunged last month, a sign that the nation’s buyers are deterred by the precious metal’s elevated prices amid a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 肯尼亚骚乱导致先令创一月以来最长跌势
item.description: 过去一个月的反政府骚乱扰乱了肯尼亚的经济，并使投资者感到恐慌，这正在伤害肯尼亚的货币，使其遭受了自一月份以来最长的一次下跌。【原文：Anti-government riots that disrupted Kenya’s economy for the past month and spooked investors are hurting its currency, which has suffered its longest decline since January.】

item.title: HDFC 银行部门寻求高达 3 亿美元的离岸贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的私营贷款机构 HDFC 银行有限公司的一个部门正计划借贷多达 3 亿美元，因为印度中央银行收紧了对国内贷款渠道的限制。【原文：A unit of HDFC Bank Ltd., India’s largest private sector lender, is planning to borrow as much as $300 million, according to people familiar with the matter, as tighter rules by the nation’s central bank restrict domestic avenues.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数将反弹，瑞安航空下调业绩展望
黄金能源集团为煤炭交易申请 6 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由 Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd.牵头的一个财团已签署协议，从包括 Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP 在内的私人信贷基金获得 6 亿美元贷款，用于支付收购澳大利亚煤矿的费用。【原文：A consortium led by Golden Energy and Resources Pte Ltd. has signed a deal for a $600 million loan from private credit funds including Davidson Kempner Capital Management LP to pay for its acquisition of an Australian coal mine, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球基金囤积近万亿元中国银行债券
item.description: 外国投资者增持了中国银行发行的短期债券，创下了新的纪录，因为有吸引力的美元转换利率继续为此类债券带来丰厚的回报。【原文：Foreign investors ramped up holdings of short-term bonds issued by Chinese banks to a fresh record, as attractive rates for swapping dollars continue to juice the returns available on such debt.】

item.title: 投资者谨记 "股票也会下跌"，重拾套期保值投资理念
item.description: 随着投资者对美国总统大选、第二季度盈利、经济增长和利率等各种问题的担忧，套期保值又开始了。【原文：Hedging is back as investors fret over concerns about everything from the US presidential election to second-quarter earnings, economic growth and interest rates.】
